project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
